A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
May contain spoilers :
I thought this movie was the best in the franchise ! It was set out and accomplished what it meant to ! To kill the past !
If they did not make this movie he way they did \, it would have been the beginning of the end for Star Wars . Instead it has been revamped \, renewed and has been the 'spark' to get the fire burning .
There may be the 'Star Wars parents ' out there saying "he's not my skywalker' . Basically acting like mothers who go my little boy can do no wrong clinging to what they wish there little boy was . However those people are wrong and flimflam to the past and something they think they own\, but don't . All in all this movie shocked me and took me into a moment where my jaw literally dropped . It made me feel stupid because I could not predict what was going to happen! Absolutely loved this film!
